title: Beethoven-Symphony_Nos._1_&_2_Cleveland_Orchestra-Szell-FLAC
description:
Ludwig van Beethoven
Symphony Nos. 1 & 2
The Cleveland Orchestra
George Szell
1964
FLAC

"One hundred men and a perfectionist."

"Between 1959 and 1964, CBS had the tape rolling in Cleveland as well, as the label captured [George] Szell and his orchestra at their peak in what remains a landmark cycle of the Beethoven symphonies.  Rationale rather than Romantic, Szell's approach was to view the canon as chamber music for symphony orchestra; the result was a traversal unsurpassed in its ensemble precision and tensile strength." - Ted Libby, The NPR Guide to Building a Classical CD Collection. p. 28.


1. Symphonie No. 1 en ut majeur, Op. 21: 1. Adagio molto - Allegro con brio
2. Symphonie No. 1 en ut majeur, Op. 21: 2. Andante cantabile con moto
3. Symphonie No. 1 en ut majeur, Op. 21: 3. Menuetto: Allegro molto e vivace
4. Symphonie No. 1 en ut majeur, Op. 21: 4. Adagio - Allegro molto e vivace
5. Symphonie No. 2 en re majeur, Op. 36: 1. Adagio molto - Allegro con brio
6. Symphonie No. 2 en re majeur, Op. 36: 2. Larghetto
7. Symphonie No. 2 en re majeur, Op. 36: 3. Scherzo: Allegro - Attacca
8. Symphonie No. 2 en re majeur, Op. 36: 4. Allegro molto


Thank you.  enjoy!
